name: Nimban Legacy
description:
Nimban Legacy is an Action rpg developed for my associates degree program at OC (Olympic College.) It is free to download but you are also welcome to support Software by Your Mom! with your donations

Game has been updated to version 1.1

Patch notes:

fixed a serious bug that allowed the player to enter the dragon tower too early and become stuck and unable to progress

added a potion of reset for players that have entered areas before it was intended to do so the potion will be in a blue chest that is only visible if you are in an area before you were intended to be there

due to user suggestions also double spaced the the scrolling intro text

Game has been updated to 1.2

Patch notes:

fixed issue that started Draknar at level 30

added or removed names from maps displaying "unused" as appropriate

dragon tower floors should display their floor number to aid in player navigation

removed debug text from several enemies so you should no longer see "this enemy strikes back for x damage" or "this enemy has died"

removed "icepath off" debug text

fixed music issue with Nasobit fight

Double Spaced scrolling epilogue text

various grammar fixes
